Japanese:
あんた、こんな時間に
何やってんの？
English: What are you up to at this hour?

Japanese:
整備だよ。
決まってんだろ。
English: Maintenance. I haven't sorted everything just yet.
...But still, it's so late...
And more to the point, that's my mech...

Japanese:
なんで、私の人形の整備に、
そんなに必死になるわけ？
English: Why are you so desperate to do maintenance work on my mech?

Japanese:
人形を
最高の状態にしておくのが、
オレの仕事だからな。
English: That's coz my job to keep the mechs in peak condition.

Japanese: アンマリー＿文句を言う

English: Really?

Japanese:
なんか下心でも
あるんじゃないの？
English: You don't have some kind of ulterior motive, do you?
As if!!

Japanese: いつもの仕事をしてるだけ。
English: I'm just doing the same stuff I normally do.

Japanese: 特別なことしてるわけじゃねぇ。
English: I haven't done anything special.

Japanese: へぇ、いつものことなんだ。
English: Hoh, so it's the same as usual?

Japanese: アンマリー＿挑発する等
ずいぶん、がんばるじゃない。
English: You've been working surprisingly hard, haven't you?

Japanese: ケイ＿イライラして喋るＬ

だから当たり前だって。
それがオレの役目なんだから。
English: Like I said, that's a given. It's my duty after all.
Hmm.

Japanese: アンマリー＿親しい人と話す
意外と真面目じゃない。
English: I never took you for the serious type.
On the topic of being serious...

Japanese:
オレは、
ちょっと後悔してんだよな。
English: I have a small regret.

Japanese:
初めて/pが
マリオネーションギアに
乗った日。
English: The day /p got on a Marionation Gear for the first time.

Japanese:
初めてオートマンと出会った、
あの時……
English: And we met the Automen for the first time, back then...

Japanese:
オレは、親方に黙って
ゴッドフリードを改造してさ。
English: I made some modifications to Godfried without telling the boss.

Japanese:
自信があったんだ。
改造の出来には。
English: I had confidence in myself, that I'd be able to make some adjustments.

Japanese:
だから……オートマンを見た時、
チャンスだと思ったんだよな。
English: That's why... When I saw the Automan, I thought it was a good chance.

Japanese:
改造の成果を試せる、
オレの凄さを見ろ、って。
English: I could test the fruits of my labour, and everyone would see how awesome I was.

Japanese:
はやく一人前になりたくて
焦ってた。
English: I was in a hurry to become a fully-fledged Technician.

Japanese: 今、思えば……間違いだった。
English: When I look back now... I realise I was wrong.

Japanese:
自分のちっぽけな
功名心のために、
事件に首をつっこんだ。
English: For the sake of my tiny achievement, I thrust us right into the middle of things.

Japanese: でも、戦いは勝ったんでしょ？
English: But, you won the fight, did you not?
Yeah.
It was a significant moment for /p.

Japanese:
でも、オレの判断が間違ってた
ことには変わりない。
English: But, that doesn't change my mind about the fact I was in the wrong.

Japanese:
/pを事件に
巻き込んだんだ。
English: I dragged /p into this whole affair.

Japanese:
今では、
オートマンとの戦いなんて、
しょっちゅうでしょ。
English: Nowadays, it seems like we're always fighting Automen.

Japanese:
オートマンが
こんなにあらわれるなんて、
誰も思ってなかったし。
English: Nobody could have predicted that it'd turn out this way.

Japanese:
あんたがどうしようが、いずれ
巻き込まれてたんじゃない？
English: No matter what you did, you'd end up getting caught up in it at some point anyway, wouldn't you?
Yeah. Probably.

Japanese: でも、オレは忘れないよ。
English: But, I haven't forgotten.

Japanese:
だから、オレは、
オレがやるべき仕事をやるのさ。
English: That's why, I have to do my job like I'm supposed to.
There's no way I'm pulling out now.

Japanese:
いつも、必ず、最高の状態の
人形に乗れるようにしといて
やるよ。
English: Whenever you use a mech, every time, without exception, I'll make sure they're in the best possible condition.
Hmm.
You're taking things too seriously.
Well, back to work, back to work.
